Biography

Hi! I am Xian Xinglang (Randy), a 17-year-old AI developer and student researcher. My research interests lie at the intersection of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) and Mathematical Modelling. I am passionate about building innovative digital tools that enhance user experience through Artificial Intelligence.

I have been recognized as a Distinguished Winner of the Apple Swift Student Challenge (Global Top 50) and was invited to Apple Park for WWDC25. I also lead research teams in mathematical modelling competitions, where we translate real-world scenarios into computable frameworks. Currently, I am working on independent projects involving emotion analysis and productivity tools, with my apps achieving Top 5 Paid App status on the App Store.
